data.age: 26 years, had this body for 7 months
data.race: Hlaar (Human, Slime, Krogan, strange animal / alien mix)

text.text:
Zumi stands 172 cm (5' 8") tall from heel to the top of her head. Though she often looks a bit taller as she almost always wears rather high heels, or if bare foot, she tends to walk on the ball of her foot. She is slightly slender and doesnâ€™t look like she would weigh much for her height but a scale would say 76 kg (167 lb). When less clothed you'd see she has a bit of muscles, as if she works out.
She has an overall female appearance but upon closer inspection she does have quite a few features that give her a more androgynous look, such as slightly wider shoulders, less of an hourglass shape, a bit sharper jaw bone and chin.
She has shoulder long strawberry blond hair that is a little uneven and ruffled but doesn't look unkempt.
Her eyes are slightly bigger with hues of sky blue and rain cloud gray.
